trans-unit.id: New to Rio de Janeiro? Don’t worry! Use RioGo to get to your events in time and without hassle.
trans-unit.source: New to Rio de Janeiro? Don’t worry! Use RioGo to get to your events in time and without hassle.
trans-unit.note: No comment provided by engineer.
trans-unit.target: Neu in Rio de Janeiro? Macht nichts! Verwende RioGo, um pünktlich und ohne Hektik an Ereignissen teilzunehmen.

trans-unit.note: No comment provided by engineer.
No comment provided by engineer.

trans-unit.target: Gib deine Urlaubsinfos ein und RioGo kümmert sich um den Rest.

trans-unit.id: Please pick a type for this location

trans-unit.note: Prompted when adding a location of unknown type to the agenda. Possible types would be Stay, Attraction, Restaurant, Place.
trans-unit.target: Please pick a type for this location

trans-unit.id: Simply enter your hotel, events and other attractions you’d like to see. RioGo will create the perfect itinerary for you each day.
trans-unit.source: Simply enter your hotel, events and other attractions you’d like to see. RioGo will create the perfect itinerary for you each day.

trans-unit.target: Gib einfach ein, wo du übernachtest, welche Ereignisse und anderen Attraktionen du besuchen möchtest. RioGo erstellt die passende Reiseroute für jeden Tag.
